a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Countries that are democracies and non-democracies,
Based on the classification and assessment by Boix et al. (2013). Democracies are understood here as political
systems in which political leaders are elected under broad right to vote for men in free and fair elections.
Data source: OWID based on Boix et al. (2013)
